=== While the phone is running current version ===

1. copy out/target/product/N19/system.img onto the sd card (as system.img)

2. copy out/target/product/N19/ramdisk.img onto the sd card (as ramdisk.img)

3. delete everything form mtd@userdata

4. flash_ramdisk.sh

5. reboot

6. enjoy


=== To use automatic flash ===

1. copy updata.txt to sd card

2. copy ramdisk.img to sd card

3. flash the phone

4. remove sd card, remove updata.txt and ramdisk.uimg from it (or use different card from this point on)

5. copy system.img to sd card

6. insert sd card back into the phone

7. reboot

8. enjoy
